section.27: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.A.W) said:"The gates of Paradise are opened on Monday and Thursday. In them, (will enter) whoever has not associated anything with Allah will be forgiven, except for the two who shun each other, (about whom) it is said: 'Return these two until they make amends
